overview: In the high stakes world of Wall Street, sex is everything. Dani Daniels, a wildly wealthy sexy slut known to many as the whore of Wall Street, learned that lesson her first day at a meeting. It was also that day that Dani Daniels learned the secret to success in finance: get em' by the balls and don't let go.
tagline: Another day, another dollar and another satisfied customer for Dani Daniels, the Whore Of Wall Street!
title: The Whore of Wall Street
